thread.title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' scenes leak; theatrical poster reveals scary new Death Star
thread.title_full: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' scenes leak; theatrical poster reveals scary new Death Star | OregonLive.com

author: Joseph Rose | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' scenes leak; theatrical poster reveals scary new Death Star
text:
With less than two months before the wildly anticipated "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" lands in theaters, Disney has released the movie's official theatrical poster and announced that tickets will go on sale Monday night.
First, let's start with the poster by artist Drew Struzan: It's epic, if for no other reason than its portrayal of the new generation of stormtroopers and the big reveal of a planet-size superweapon that makes the original Death Star look like a baby's toy.
Oddly, Luke Skywalker is nowhere to be seen.
On Sunday, Disney said it will also unveil the final trailer from the film during halftime of "Monday Night Football" on ESPN (a Disney network showing the country's most watched football, so it sort of makes sense.)
Actor John Boyega, who plays Finn in the new movie, also posted what appears to be a snippet of the trailer on his Instagram .
Other pieces of the trailer are also popping up on the Interwebs early. (And this is why "Star Wars" nerds can't have nice things.)
Update: It looks like at least one both of the Instagram videos featuring new footage has suddenly disappeared like Alderaan.
Repost @starwarsarchive || Leaked footage from the new trailer?
A video posted by Star Wars VII™ (@starwars_vii) on Oct 18, 2015 at 10:19am PDT
Repost @starwarsarchive || Leaked footage from the new trailer?

Update 2: Here's a better look at one of the trailers for the trailer (this is getting nutty).
Update 3: Here are more scenes: The Resistance gathers tomorrow. Watch @ESPN 's Monday Night Football for a new look at #TheForceAwakens . https://t.co/Ft8vVg26VG
— Star Wars (@starwars) October 18, 2015 Tickets to "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" will reportedly go on sale online and at theaters Monday evening , after the broadcast of the full trailer.
